title: Breakingviews TV: LBO dangers
text:
Breakingviews TV: LBO dangers 1:01pm EDT - 03:24 
The bankruptcies of Toys R Us, Claire’s and iHeartMedia underscore the potential pitfalls of high-priced leveraged buyouts. Richard Beales and Tom Buerkle discuss how private equity’s record capital and lofty purchase multiples risk a repeat of those pre-crisis deals.   
The bankruptcies of Toys R Us, Claire’s and iHeartMedia underscore the potential pitfalls of high-priced leveraged buyouts. Richard Beales and Tom Buerkle discuss how private equity’s record capital and lofty purchase multiples risk a repeat of those pre-crisis deals.  //reut.rs/2IDC6WB
